name: Layar Kosong AI Structured Index
description: Indeks data terstruktur (JSON) dan panduan konten mentah (llms.txt / llms.md) dari semua artikel Blog Layar Kosong, dioptimalkan untuk Generative Engine Optimization (GEO).

ai_apis.purpose: Provides a comprehensive, structured index of all blog articles including URL, title, summary, and category for efficient knowledge retrieval (RAG).
Content guide using the standard llms.txt path for compliance and quick ingestion.
Alternative content guide using the explicit llms.md extension for clarity.
